welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Amarante, a charming city known for its stunning scenery, historic buildings, and delicious gastronomy. Get ready to explore and immerse yourselves in the beauty and culture of our beloved city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Braga Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal, handling all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password or registration.
